body:
If you want your buffers to be sent to the GPU along with all the module parameters, you should save them as Tensors and use the `register_buffer` method. See e.g.  [BatchNorm source](https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/torch/nn/modules/batchnorm.py#L23-L24).

Note that we're using GitHub issues for bug reports only, and all questions should be posted on [our forums](discuss.pytorch.org).
